sentences.en: A meal high in fat, sugar and calories may cause arteries to constrict , reducing blood flow.
sentences.cn: 食用高脂肪, 高糖份,高卡路里的食品将会导致我们的动脉紧缩, 减慢血液循环.

sentences.en: Are you sure to constrict the picture database?
sentences.cn: 您确定要压缩当前的图像数据库 吗 ?

sentences.en: Caffeine constricts the blood vessels in your body.
sentences.cn: 咖啡因会使体内的血管收缩。

sentences.en: Certain triggers dilation and constrict these vessels.
sentences.cn: 某些触发扩张,并会限制这些船只.

sentences.en: Corset: Article of clothing worn to shape or constrict the torso.
sentences.cn: 紧身健美装: 一种贴身内衣或外部装饰,使体形美观或紧束身躯用的衣物.

sentences.en: If it wins the grapple check , it establishes a hold and can constrict.
sentences.cn: 如果它通过了擒抱鉴定, 它将紧握并能够压缩.

sentences.en: In severe cases, the airway can constrict.
sentences.cn: 重症患者会出现气管痉挛.

sentences.en: Linda’s throat constricted and she started to cry.
sentences.cn: 琳达喉咙发紧，哭了起来。

sentences.en: Nerves constrict the blood vessels in the extremities of the body.
sentences.cn: 神经促使人手脚处的血管开始收缩.

sentences.en: Panic can constrict the blood vessels and impose an additional burden on the heart.
sentences.cn: 恐慌会使血管收缩,增加心脏负担.

sentences.en: Perhaps, peripheral blood vessels are mistakenly told to constrict, increasing blood pressure.
sentences.cn: 或许, 外围血管被错误地告知,需要其压缩, 从而使血压升高.

sentences.en: Severe migraines can be treated with a drug that constricts the blood vessels.
sentences.cn: 严重偏头痛可以用一种收缩血管的药物来治疗。

sentences.en: Small doses constrict the blood vessels and large doses dilate the blood vessel.
sentences.cn: 小剤量能收缩血管.大剤量能扩张血管.

sentences.en: Tending draw together or constrict tissues ; styptic.
sentences.cn: (有关环境)倾向于压缩自由的.

words.tran_cn: 紧缩的；束紧的；压缩性的
收缩；压缩；紧窄感；压缩物
大蟒；括约肌；使压缩之物

trans.tran_en: to make something narrower or tighter, or to become narrower or tighter

trans.tran_cn: 压缩， 压紧，妨害，阻碍，收缩，挤压
